edu.neu.ccs.cs5004.problem2

Class AbstractLeague

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.neu.ccs.cs5004.problem2.AbstractLeague
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILeague
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmericanFootballLeague, BaseballLeague, SoccerLeague

    public abstract class AbstractLeague
extends Object
implements ILeague
    Represents details of a league, including league name, season start month and end month, number of games in the league and next game to be played.
